parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the network object belongs.

parameters.name: ImageList
parameters.description: An array that consists of the images of the network object.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace to which the network object belongs.

parameters.name: TagList
parameters.description: An array that consists of the labels specified for the network object.

parameters.name: TargetName
parameters.description: The name of the object to be blocked.
